בסך הכל קיבלתי את מה ששילמתי עליו, למעט דחיית שעת עזיבה שהחיוב אינו משקף ולא במאום את זמן העיכוב, חבל....גם אן מי שיקשיב. ביקשתי מראש שעה נוספת בשל עיניני עבודה, בדקו במחשב אמרו שאין לחץ לפנות את נחדר אבל כל עיכוב יחוייב בתשלום של 200 שח.

name: One Bedroom Apartment - Eilot Street
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Public or shared beach access - Guests can enjoy a nearby beach
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: Centrally located in a typical residential building on the 3rd floor (no lift)  in the Northern parts of Eilat City Center, this one bedroom apartment offers spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a renovated bathroom and a seperate bedroom with a queen size bed.Enjoy the comfort of your own home, plunge in the comfy sofa and watch TV after a long day at the beach. The quiet location guarantees a peaceful & relaxing stay while being within short walking distance to the attractions.
additional_house_rules:
• No smoking
• No pets
• No parties or events

reviews.comments: Exactly as pictured, very clean, wonderful location and walking distance to beautiful beaches, markets, restaurants and shops! Sivan meet us in person and gave us a tour of the apartment, he also ensured that we had an easy way to communicate and get in touch with him, should we have any questions or concerns! Parking was very easy on the street right in front of the building with no restrictions, for those who rent a car. That was a huge plus for us, as we had quite a difficult time parking the week we were in Jerusalem.

What you see is what you get! This apartment was very clean and perfect for my wife and I. The bedroom was perfect size with fresh linen and towels. The air conditioning worked great and we slept great.
The communication with Avi was great. He was ready for us the moment we were ready for him, and didn’t rush us to check out.
The WiFi worked great, and he left a booklet with a step by step on how to use all the amenities in the apartment, from the TV to the expresso machine.
The location is also amazing. About a 10 minute walk to the malls and beach. 5 minute walk to the Rebbi Mier Bal Hanes shul and a 12 minute walk to the Chabad of Eilat.
Overall I would most definitely recommend, and looking forward to returning next time I’m in Eilat!

The place was super clean and well furnished. Perfect place for 2. Easy walk to the beach. Super good communication and Avi was super helpful with showing up and getting us situated within the apartment. They even go so far as to leave a booklet with information on restaurants and activities to do.

Exactly as pictured; clean, comfortable, renovated 1-bedroom flat in an older building. The hosts were friendly and helpful. Located near supermarket, beach and laundry facilities. We really enjoyed our stay - Highly recommended.
Thank you to Sivan and Avi for hosting me!  I felt right at home and had an incredible experience.  Avi is this nicest guy around and I immediately trusted him like family!  Thanks again!!!

The apartment was very clean
There were clean sheets, coffe maker and all the kitchen appliances needed.
The location is a bit far from central locations in Eilat but if you get here with car than it’s easy to get wherever you need.
The building was a bit old but the apartment was clean and new.

Will come next time
Very accurate to the pictures, the building is a bit old, great place.
A bit smaller than expected
The host is very professional, the site is perfect, clean, on time, and there will always be someone to help you. Very efficient and cosy
very nice! a bit small and the building is quit old and broken, however the kitchen is fully equipted, the apartment is clean and beautiful the access to it is east by car!

Lovely place with a great design and a perfect location! Very clean, nice furniture, and all communications were fast and awesome!)

Plenty of ultra hot water during the sunny day, and if you would like to have a shower in the morning it is better to heat the boiler a bit!)

We llike this apartment very much. It is very beautiful and clean, and the location is amazing. Communication with host was fast .
Thanks a lot!
Recommended!!!
We got what we looked for

Had a nice stay all and all, the photos are accurate. The neighborhood and building are not too fancy, and you might hear the neighbors dog barking for a while at night. Need to take into account it's a walk to the center and the beach. Communication with the contact person (Lena) was good and she was very responsive.
thanks alot was very good
Great place, comfortable and pleasant
Clean, nice and cosy for two, you got all what you need in the house or in the area around.

A little shabby but clean apartment with perfect location ( 10 mins walk from the central bus station and city center, 15-20 min walk from the beach.  note  the acoustics in the building — from the bedroom u can hear  the neighbors talking like they are here  in the room.
A great (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable, clean and convenient
It was nice and clean
Lovely place

We had a great stay in Sivan‘s apartment. Very nice apartment, good location! Checkin was a bit bumpy but otherwise very good communication and Sivan was so kind to let us stay a night longer because of Yom Kippur. Thanks again Sivan!

Nice apt.
Was under unfinished renovation when we stayed there.
No shower towels.

Sivan and Avi were fantastic hosts. They communicated well and Avi met us in person to check us in, as well as give good information about the apartment and hotel. As our daughter was sick, he even recommended doctors and called the next day to check up on her which was very kind. Apartment is modern and in a great location with several supermarkets nearby. Do try the Italian across the road - superb! Thanks Avi and Sivan.
Great experience!! Very friendly owner. Quiet area and close to center!

Sivan and Avi where the most wonderfull hosts you can wish for. The place Was perfectly clean and they went way out of their way to help us in any way possible. 100% would recommend. Nothing at all to complain. Thanks for your hospitality.
A beautiful apartment with perfect air conditioning

A very nice place and a great welcome. Sivan showed us around in the appartement. Comfortable bed, aircondition, supermarket across the street. And if you like shawarma, Sivan can tell you where to go!
A nice and clean apartment for the price, considering prices in Eilat. The only disadvantage is that the shower does not have a curtain, and there is always water left on the bathroom floor.

The apartment looks exactly as advertised - good and new condition and clean. Avi was very helpful getting us into the apartment. We did not mind walking and found the apartment well located. We enjoyed our stay.

The appartment is great and exactly what we were looking for. Check-in was super smooth and really kind.

5 star sirbnb. Thank you so much!

We had a wonderful stay at Sivan’s apartment. It is perfectly furnished and equipped, great shower with very hot water (though a tight fit for very tall guest). Naturally brightly lit open space. Comfy couch and bed. Location is excellent IF you have a car.
Good value for your money. Nice local tips from the operator Avi.
Nice stay without any problem..

Having spent few days in Eilat with my wife and kid, time in which we were accommodated at Avi's flat, it was a fantastic trip and it more than matched our expectations. The place was sparkling clean!!!, All furniture was modern and the bed and sofa extremely comfy. I am not sure what others are looking for but for a group of 3-4 people or a small family is the best value money can buy. Kitchen was fully loaded with the necessary apliences, bathroom was Big, rooms were lit nicely and you have a sea side view to brighten your morning or your evening after a sunny day out.

The flat is located about 10 minutes walk from the beach, it has 2 shops nearby and a playground for kids behind the block. Very easy check in / check out system. Super

Regarding our host, it was a real, real pleasure to have met such nice people. We communicated really easy, we were picked up by Avi from the bus station, helped with advice, and before we left the country while on airport he rang just to make sure we were ok.

It was not only the place, but the experience, the feel safe factor that will make us come back here with our next trip sometimes in the autumn.
Everything was perfect!  Very hospitable and clean apartments! Thank you

A real tidy and stylish place. Lots of space to spend a good time, apartment as in the pictures, very helpful host.
Unfortunately some issues with hygiene in the building, but still recommended.
very kind hosts, perfect equipped and tastefull designed appartment. Very good and new mattress. quite in the night. great sleeping. 100%"recommended + I come definitely back.
good apartments, well located, free parking is available. Apartments are cozy and good equipped!
One of the best place we stayed during our trip around Israël.  Don’t hesitate!
Nice apartment, compatible with the pictures. Relatively close to the center, but not enough. Communication with the host was average minus.
Sivan was a wonderful host and the house was beautiful and  clean. Great location, the neighborhood is very quiet and safe, close to the beach.
great location, cozy and clean, comunication was very smooth. i would defo recommend the apartmant.
Nice location. Very clean. Well equipped.
Sivan's place is lovely. Well located with an incredible steak house just opposite. Must try the ice cream place too.

Sivan place is a new well design with everything u need for a short stay at Eilat
i was the second guest,so the apartment was brand new and sparkling clean
2 strong a.c are a most for staying at Eilat in august
ill glad to visit again next time im around(-:

הדירה עצמה נחמדה מאוד, נקייה ונוחה. השירותים והמקלחת נוחים, המיטה והמטבח גם מעולים. נמצאת מול סופרמרקט.

אבל יש לה שני חסרונות עיקריים:
1. מדובר בדירה מחולקת, אותה חולקים עם עוד קבוצה. לנו למשל לא התמזל המזל, והיינו עם חבורה של ערסים ששמעו מוזיקה בקולי-קולות, צעקו המון, ובכללי די הרסו לנו את חוויית השהות בדירה
2. המיקום שלה לא מאוד טוב. היא נמצאת בלב שכונה באילת, בבניין די מגעיל. היא די רחוקה מהטיילת, מדובר ב15 דקות הליכה, לכיוון הטיילת זה בירידה ובחזור זו עלייה של השמחות.
דירה נעימה ונוחה ולא רחוקה מהים. בעל הבית זמין לשאלות. הדירה ענתה על הציפיות. תודה.

Прекрасная квартира, чисто, уютно и есть все необходимое для комфортного отдыха. Удобное расположение, 15 минут до центральной автобусной станции, 15 минут до пляжа и набережной, недалеко есть автобусные остановки.
שירות מעולה. מיקום מושלם. יש קיוסק עם מצרכים בסיסיים ממש מתחת לדירה זה היה מעולה. דירה כיפית ונעימה

השירות היה מהיר ונהדר,סיפקו מגבות וטישו כשהיה צריך ויש מכולת ממש ממול שזה דיי נח
הדירה נמצאת בקומה שלישית ללא מעלית וריח של סיגריות תמידיבחדר המדרגות,יש לציין שזה ממש לא קשור לדירה,שהיא ממש נוחה ומאובזרת.
סה"כ היה מאוד נעים.
נ.ב. 20 דק הליכה מהים, חזור קצת יותר בגלל שזו עליה.
אירוח מהמם, חנייה קרובה, זמינות בנייד לכל שאלה, גמישות בשעות הקבלה והעזיבה.. דירה מקסימה ומאובזרת (-:
דירה פשוטה ומספקת בהחלט למי שרוצה רק ללון באילת

היה נהדר,
תמורה נהדרת למחיר!
מקום נחמד ונקי. תקשורת מצויינת מול בעלי הבית, מענה מאד מהיר לכל שאלה ובקשה.  החיסרון היחיד שהדירה נמצאת בקומה 3 בלי מעלית אבל המדרגות קלות לעליה.

סה״כ הדירה עצמה נקייה ומאובזרת.
עם זאת הדירה הינה דירה מחולקת ולכן חשוב שבדירה ממול יהיו שכנים טובים ( לנו לדוגמא היו צעקות באמצע הלילה וריח של סיגריות).
הדירה בקומה רביעית והדרך לשם לא תואמת את איך שהדירה נראת בתמונות.
המארחים היו אדיבים והצ׳ק אין היה פשוט ומהיר ואף נתנו לנו להיכנס לפני שעת הצ׳ק אין.
המזרון בחדר השינה היה מאוד לא נוח.
סה״כ תמורה טובה למחיר.

הדירה הייתה יוצאת מהכלל, מאוד נקי ומסודר.
כל מה שהיינו צריכים היה בדירה, כולל מכונת קפה .

יצאנו מאוד מרוצים מהחוויה שלנו במיוחד שזה היה קרוב לים.
הגענו כזוג והדירה ענתה על כל דרישותינו. מומלץ בחום. הגענו עם רכב והמיקום היה נהדר, מאמין שהוא עונה על הדרישות גם למי שללא רכב.

מקום נחמד.
טיפה גבוהה, אומנם עם אתם עם רכב אז לא בעיה.
תקשורת מהירה.

Чистая,уютная,квартира-студия.Есть всё необходимое.Очень удобная кровать,прям спиться сладко)До моря 10 минут пешком.Представитель хозяина, женщина  Елена всегда была на связи,общительная и в целом приятный человек.Рекомендую.

בניגוד לכל מה שכולם כתבו, אנחנו נתקלנו בחוויה שונה.
מההתחלה, כששאלנו את המארח שאלות דרך האתר, לא קיבלנו תשובות או שקיבלנו מענה אוטומטי (חוץ מפעם אחת).
בניגוד להצהרה, לא, הדירה לא במרחק 7 דק מהטיילת, אלא 10 לפחות. ובהלוך מדובר בירידה ולכן בחזור צריך לעלות בעלייה. ביולי אוגוסט זה לא נעים. נכון שאפשר לקחת מונית, אבל מראש הזמנו דירה שרצינו שתהיה קרובה לטיילת ולא תיכננו לקחת מוניות.
בדירה היו מס דברים שלנו אישית הפריעו (ואולי אנחנו ביקורתיים מידי):
•הדירה הייתה קטנה יותר מאשר חשבנו שתהיה. היא צפופה לארבעה אבל אפשר להסתדר עם זה.
• לא צויין באתר שהדירה בקומה רביעית בבניין ללא מעלית.
•חלק מהמצעים היו מוכתמים.
לא היה סבון ידיים בשירותים.
•שקע חשמלי שהיה בולט מהקיר במטבח, שזה כמובן מסוכן.
•בקופסת תיונים היו מס תיונים משומשים.
•את הספה הנפתחת לא ערכו לנו מראש, ואנחנו היינו אמורים לעשות את זה בעצמנו. היינו מצפים שהספה תהיה פתוחה וערוכה כי ההזמנה הייתה לארבעה אנשים. מצד שני, קיבלנו שוק מגודל הדירה כאשר הספה הייתה פתוחה. לכן אני מאמין שאם הייתי המארח גם אני לא הייתי פותח אותה מראש.

למרות זאת, המטבח בדירה היה מאובזר בציוד מטבח שענה על הדרישות שלנו. כאשר כבר הגענו לדירה קיבלנו מענה מהיר ואדיב מהמארחים.
מול הדירה נמצא מרכז מור שבו מסעדה איטלקית מצויינת, גלידה מעולה וכנאפה מדהים, לא פחות. גם סופרמרקט שחלק מהמוצרים בו לא היו הטריים ביותר על גבול המקולקלים. אבל יש עוד דראג סטור ליד. חבל שלא צוין מראש על הקרבה למסעדות השוות, בהחלט שיקול שנלקח אצלנו בחשבון בזמן ההזמנה.

סהכ, הדירה קטנה וקופמפקטית. בהתחלה מקבלים שוק אבל אפשר להסתדר. קצת צפופה לארבעה אבל אפשרי. הדברים הקטנים כמו המיטה, המצעים המלוכלכים, השקע, חוסר המענה לשאלות שלפני ההגעה, והסתרת הפרטים הללו עיצבנו אותנו ואיכזבו אותנו. אם היינו יודעים מראש אולי היינו מתבאסים פחות.
Отличная квартира
אחלה של דירה! מרווחת מאוד וחדשנית. נקייה ומסודרת. מרחק של כמה דק הליכה מהקניון והטיילת. הבעלים היו איתנו מאוד גמישים בצק אין ובצק אאוט משהו שלא ניתן למצוא כמעט. אחלה תמורה למחיר

name: Sun and Sea
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Barbecue utensils - Grill, charcoal, bamboo skewers/iron skewers, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Private backyard – Not fully fenced - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Single level home - No stairs in home
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: יחידה מקסימה, נעימה ונקייה, מתאימה בעיקר לאירוח זוג או זוג + 2 ילדים, במקום חדר שינה ובו מקלחת ושירותים צמודים, בנוסף סלון עם ספה נפתחת וטלוויזיה חכמה, מטבחון מאובזר בכל מה שצריך, איזור ישיבה מוצל בחוץ עם שולחן ישיבה ואופציה למנגל. יש חניה בשפע ללא תשלום,מכולת במרחק 3 דקות הליכה, פתוחה עד חצות כולל שישי שבת.ניתן לרדת לחוף הים בהליכה של 10 דקות בלבד, או תחנת אוטובוס בקצה הרחוב. איזור שקט .The spaceWe are in the centre of the town close to everything.Guest accessThe unit and the seating area outside are for us of guests.Other things to noteמכולת נמצאת בקצה רחוב הצאלון, פתוחה שישי שבת. תחנת אוטובוס במורד הרחוב.

In overall was good option in case you”re not going to spend a lot of time inside...

description: The spaceדירת הנופש - נרקיס  ממוקמת בעיר הנופש הדרומית הקסומה אילת, במיקום המבוקש ביותר, מרחק הליכה של כ-10 דקות מהים, הטיילת המהממת ומקניון "מול הים".הדירה נמצאת בשכונת גנים המקסימה והשקטה. כ-8 ק"מ מהמצפה התת ימי, מפארק המים החדש של העיר ומריף הדולפינים. בדירה תמצאו מטבח מאובזר במלואו  לנוחיותכם עם כלי מטבח  / מקרר / מיקרוגל / כיריים חשמליים וקומקום. כמו כן תהנו מאינטרנט אלחוטי, מיזוג אוויר, חנייה פרטית וטלוויזיות מסך שטוח  עם Yes / Netflix .הדירה מתאימה לזוגות ולמשפחות בלבד, היא כוללת חדר שינה, חדר רחצה אחד וסלון מפנק שניתן להסב לחדר שינה נוסף.Other things to noteסופרמרקט זמין הפועל 7 ימים בשבוע בקרבת הדירה.

description: Cute, cozy, and small studio 30m. Great location 300 m to the bar and restaurant district, 500 meters from the beach and the boardwalk. On the 7th floor with elevator. There is no balcony its a picture from the window. Amazing view the Eilat mountains and bay. In addition, supermarket, bakery, and falafel place right under the building.The spaceModest but cute and cozy studio best described by the picturesGuest accessYou have access to your own studio and the benches in the garden under the building
additional_house_rules:
A picture of the bookers full name in english and passport number are required for the guest book and the tax authorities as it is required  in israel.
There is a security camera recording at the entrance of the door!
interaction: I am always available by phone, email, or whatsup
transit: My place being pretty central, the best way to get around is by foot or taxi which are not expensive in eilat

reviews.comments: Views! I was able to see the sunrise from behind the mountains and have a panoramic view of Eilat. Bed was comfortable and the coffee was greatly appreciated. Jojo had great communication and the check in process was easy. I would recommend this place to everyone wanting to stay in Eilat.
Really nice place, close to the beach, airport and central bus station...

Jojo’s place was great! Very close to the tayelet, convenient location. He also replied any time there was anything we needed and was very flexible :) all in all, cute place perfect for my boyfriend and me, good price and location, would recommend!

solid location, great communication by JoJo. my father stayed there for wedding festivities. place was one studio into a concerted apartment with 2 other studios. small rooms, but very comfortable. only issue was cleanliness, could have been cleaner across the board.

Cons: The place isn’t the same as the photos at all! In the photos it looks modern and clean. It looks like there’s a balcony. There’s an iron gate around the window so you can barely stick your hand outside to take a photo to make it look like a balcony. I imagine that’s what jail would feel like. In reality the place is so small, the furniture is old, I was really really disappointed! He divided a 3 bedroom apartment into 3 separate units. Your shower/bathtub is literally in the kitchen/living room...Not in the toilet area with the door. So you’ll have no privacy taking a shower. It’s one thing to be a good communicator. But he wouldn’t stop calling and texting me. If I’m busy like going through security at the border, or maybe I’m tired from the day and don’t feel like answering right away, he’ll keep texting and calling. It was annoying although he probably meant well. Last, he sent me a message saying he accidentally gave me the bigger room with the tub. As if he did me a favor. I would’ve preferred the room in the photo that has a shower in the bathroom not in the kitchen.

Pros: Great location 1 mile from the beach and 0.3 miles from the bars/pubs.
The A/C works great. No problem getting in touch with him.

Overall I would pay a bit more and stay in a hotel next time I come to Eilat. At least it will look more like the photos.
reviews.response: Unfortunately their is not much to answer to Rose who is a hypocrite and a liar, i let my previous 240 reviews speak for themselves. In addition rose would not have to pay a little more for the hotel but at least 4 times the amount she payed per night

reviews.comments:
Jojo's flat in Eilat was absolutely the perfect place to stay. The amazing view from the pictures is exactly what you would see upon your arrival.

The location is in very close proximity to the airport, mall, restaurants, and almost everything....

Jojo was a very attentive host that would literally respond quickly whenever you needed him or whether you had any questions about getting around.

This flat is gets two thumbs up and a A+, and I promise you would not regret booking this location.
Jojo was very friendly and excellent host. He always asking if we need anything and give the best tips for places to go.  We highly recommended JoJo and his cute apartment Thank you
Check in was very easy. JoJo is a great host with an apartment that is walkable to the beach. Everything was clean and taken care of.

This place was exactly as advertised.  Geeat space for a couple.  Very cose to shopping and eating out.  It was very clean which for me is a must.  Jojo provided clear instructions for both check in and check out and made a.point to check that all was going well with oit stay.  Tbis was our firat AirBnB stay and based on this we will definitely be using it more often.

Good use of small space. Great shower head. Good location. Host was very friendly on the phone, but responses took a long time.
Few amenities. Was awoken at 6:30 am due to pigeons , everyday, and twice they actually came in through the windows!
Ok for a short stay.
reviews.response: Close the window lady there is air-conditioning.... Lol (no pigeons actually came into the room)

reviews.comments: Joe's apartment is an excellent value, it is basic but bright, clean and well equipped. It has a great view, is a short walk to the beach promenade and bus station. It is also across the street from a supermarket and a great falafel sandwich shop, not to mention all the restaurants by the beach. We enjoyed our stay in Eilat very much.
Budget friendly and great location! It's about a 10min walk to the marina, where you have the beach and restaurants. The place worked perfectly for me.
Great place! Great location! Beautiful view... close to the airport and the beach. Jojo is great, very accommodating and understanding.

Wonderful place!! A 5 minute drive to practically anywhere in the city; the beaches, the beachwalk, the bars and clubs, the shopping center and the mall. Extremely fair price considering how centered and nice the place is. Size of a hotel room, comes with all amenities necessary, clean and neat, and has a beautiful view. Easy check in&check out, great communication with Jojo. We will definitely be staying here again in the future!

Jojo's place was perfect for our Eilat trip. Short walk from the bus station, the promenade and the restaurants and supermarkets.

Jojo was very available and gave clear access instructions. The place was clean and comfy, perfect for my girlfriend and I. Recommend it for your eilat trip!
Unbeatable location at a great price. 10 minute walk to the beach and malls. Not to mention the wonderful 7th story views of the bay! I would definitely stay again
Jojo was very detailed about how to check in and kept in contact throughout our stay! The location was perfect.
Jojo was easy to contact and helped us with anything we needed. The apartment was great, comfortable and great location. We really enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended!
Great location and easy check-in!

This really is in the heart of Eliat.  If your interested in nite life - beaches and all the tourist stuff, it's down the street and walkable.  The snorkeling at Orchid Beach would require a cab - but it's well worth it.  Rent some gear and go see one of the last living coral reefs.   I got a bit turned around while driving in but the landmark near the apartments is the Pyramid and the Irish Pub.  The small but efficient unit for one or two is just up the hill a few hundred yards.  Enjoyed my stay and Jojo's help.

Had a great  time at Jojo,s apartment. All you need for a great stay in a great location. The apartment was very clean. Had great communication when needed. Highly recommended. Loved the city and lots to do here.
Nice location... Walking distance to main shops... Easy parking.. JoJo was a little hard to deal with
reviews.response: Well I have 20 feedbacks saying I am helpful and friendly, the fact is that you did not want to stand and abide by house rules. Thus,I had to insist, this is probably why I did not recommend you, which is very rare

reviews.comments:
Jojo's apartment was a perfect place to stay! Amazing location, close to everything. The sea view is really nice. His home is cozy and clean and it has all the necessities for a very comfortable vacation.

Jojo was a great host, very responsive and helpful. I highly recommend this apartment for your Airbnb stay and would love to come back here next time I'm in Eilat.
reviews.response: Thank you for being a great guests

reviews.comments: The value for money is very low .. At the price that the property owner demands, you can take a room in a hotel, without paying for cleaning and service fees, and of course receive accordingly.  There were no towels, soap and shampoo that is so standard - there was none.  I was hoping that when I got to the apartment at 5pm she would already be clean and ready as he promised, even though the cleaner still cleaned the apartment at 5pm.  Besides, the room was really clean and the location is great with parking
It is good for a couple but you can find better price and room, I felt that I have been watched anyway there were some problems in the room when I arrived and I thought that there was a balcony.

Joel was quick to respond, helpful and very nice.
The place is small but had everything we needed. Its in a great location and has a great view of the sea and the city.
I loved staying in jojo's place.
Good host very easy to communicate the place itself  very nice simple and the location is a 7-minute walk from the main mall of Eilat and a 10-minute walk from the bitch
Jojo is a great host and his place has simply the most amazing views. Fantastic location as well - close to restaurants and beaches and he provided many helpful suggestions.

The place was very clean and had everything you would need for an overnight stay! Jojo was very hospitable and helped us out with great restaurant recommendations as well. He was quick to respond with any questions we had which was always great!

Everything was fine. We mostly loved the view and the short walking distance to the beach. From the Window you Can see the sunrise and the sunset as well.There is even a small 24/7 Supermarket under the building which was very convinient for us. Bars, Restaurants and a nice Shoppingcenter is only a few Minutes away. The appartment was clean and had everything we needed. Jojo was always reachable when we had questions. We definitely enjoyed our stay
Very good location, I guess for Eljat a reasonable price as well.
The checkin was super smooth, all the information was very clear and correct. Jojo is a very involved host and the location of the studio is super convenient! Plus: free parking in front :)
Nice place, quick response time, 5 minutes from the mall.
Jojo is a great host. The apartment suited us well for our needs.

Great location with incredible views from the 7th floor overlooking the southern part of Eilat. Cozy apartment within walking distance to city center, nearby 24hr grocery and plenty of taxis passing by. Highly recommended.

Thank you for hosting me. I enjoyed the stay in your modern and clean appartment very much, a great view on the city.  I absolutely recommend it for a stay in Eilat and will come back definitely. Best, Raimund
The flat was exactly what I expected regarding the pictures. Jojo gave us some great local recommendations!
Place exactly as advertised - clean, well located, and quiet.  Also good communication with Jojo.  Thanks!

Great host, flat is the same as described, not more not less. Great flat for the price, and the location of the apartment is amazing, falafel stand in 1 minute walk, grocery shop, beach is 8 minutes walk.

Our stay in jojo's place was great. He gave us perfect suggestions for restaurants and bars and he was always available online when we needed him! The view from the window is awesome!
Thank you for this amazing stay!
Nice Place and great host!
Great location, clean and all you need for a very good price! Jojo was a helpful, caring host! I can highly recommended staying!

Jojo is a wonderful host and owns probably the apartment with the best view over the city.
He was very organized, supplied us with all the necessary information all while being nice and relaxed. Great host :)
The apartment is located on the 7th floor with a great view over the city and sea. It is clean and tidy, equipped with all the necessary details and has a strong AC. There is enough room for two persons and their luggage and the bar stools are a smart detail. Just a person over 1.7 m will have to bend down a bit in the shower due to the fixed shower head.
We would come back anytime and can recommend the apartment and Jojo without hesitation.

The apartment is exactly as described. The location is very good, walking distance from the airport, beach, shops and restaurants. The check-in/out was very easy and the communication with Jojo was excellent.
Great LOCATION, near everything, great HOSPITALITY, COMMUNICATION with the host. Super clean, quite, great view, generally speaking perfect choice, Thank u Jojo!!

Jojo was an amazing host! When we arrived there was an issue with the toilet, we called him and even though he was out of town, he sent a plumber to fix this within an hour! Jojo called us to check that the plumber did his job fine, and he really cared that we will be satisfied. The location is great, 5 minutes walk from the beach, and the view of the Gulf of Eilat is fantastic. Highly recommended.
Very good location, cosy and clean apartment. Excellent communication. Jojo even borrow us some masks to do snorkeling! Highly recommend

The time in eilat was very nice. The apartment was located near the huge traffic circle in the west corner of the red Sea. It was quite enough but also good for walking all necessary bars. The view is great. Only the house seems a little big dirty. But the room was clean and very well prepared.
Jojo is also online if you need him.
Jojo's place location is great, very close to 24/7 supermarket, very close to the center and the beach. The room was clean and cozy. Thanks Jojo:)

Jojo will go out of his way to accommodate you! His place is lovely with a store right across the street to get anything you need. Close to the beach and boardwalk. There’s an elevator to get up to the 7th floor - which we didn’t see till after we hauled our suitcases up! Lol
Good central location with great shops nearby.  Good comms with Jojo.  Easy access and check in to the apt.    Kitchen amenities were sparse and could be improved.

My friend and I had a pleasant stay at Jojo’s place. He’s a great host, he has been checking on us every day asking us if we need anything. The apartment was very clean and it has an amazing view from the window. The position of the apartment is perfect, only 5-10 minute walk from promenade (Tayelet). If you want to go to the Aquarium or to the Dolphin Reef Beach you can take bus 16. The bus station is 5 minutes walk from the apartment, located on the opposite street of Canyon Ha Yam. I’d definitely stay here again!
It was really pleasant to stay here,thanks))

This place is quite perfect if you want to enjoy Eilat's beaches with a view. You can reach the beach by a short walk, like 500 meters from the apartment, there you find the hotel and shopping mall area , and thats also where the nightlife starts with shops, a little bazaar and theme rides. Or you can take bus number 15 to the beautiful corall area ( thats a must see ) or to see the doplhins or you can just visit calmer beaches. The apartment is quiet and there is a supermarket right behind the building, thats almost open all the time and has slightly better prices than the ones in the beach area. The apartment is clean , has a nice little bathroom and a big bed. You can cook for yourself or walk down to the nearby restaurants, before the beach. The central bus station is also near, like 500 meters, but to the other direction and to the right at the junction. From there you can reach the Dead Sea or Jerusalem, other locations. There is a small airport in Eilat too, so from the window you can see the airplanes landing, also from the beach, thats quite a cool site. They are not loud and they only go like once in an hour. The best feature of the apartment is the sight ! Sitting in the window you can can see the beach, the hotels, the airplanes landing, the ships out on the water, its really relaxing and you can enjoy a drink after the beach watching this sight. The apartment has a nice, sunny vibe, its comfortable and makes you feel happy. It is situated on a small hill, but its real close to the heart of everything, you can reach it with a comfortable walk, only problem if you are disabled maybe, then going up to the place could be a bit exhausting, but its really nothing , its not too high. I would choose this place again if i am to visit Eilat agin. Even the big fountain is close, but it wasnt working yet when we were there. Eilat is quite a relaxed place, the sea has the most beautiful fishes !

Jojos apartment fits well for two people. The space is small but has everything you need (small kitchen, big bed). We didn't meet Jojo in person but he was still a very good host - very friendly and professional, helping us with everything via (Hidden by Airbnb) and even lending us masks for snorkelling (thanks again!!) The house itself was unfortunately a little dirty but the apartment was clean.

Very good communiction and organisation.
The flat was very suitable and comfortable.
The view - wonderfull.
24/7 Shop just in the front of house - good equipped.
Beach , airport in Eilat- not far away,
But planes doesnt fly at night.
(-) city centre is also not far away so audible sounds of parties on weekend.

I can recommend this place
Very helpful host and easy keysafe check-in. Perfect location. Very friendly and helpful. Nice, clean and has everything you need. Two thumbs up!!!
Look for my statement und (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) .

I recommend JoJo's apartment 2/7 without any limitation. The view over
this part of Eilat and. the Red Sea is superb and changes during the day many times but always in a spectacular way. The interior oft the room is satisfying by design and very well equipped. The WLAN is excellent.
Don't hesitate any longer: Book it.

Jojo is a really nice host! He was always in contact with us and helped us with all the little things we needed. The apartment is really comfortable and has everything you need to cook your own meal. Only 10 minutes to the Central Bus Station by foot and 10 min. to the beach. The location is really good for exploring Eilat to the fullest. The view is really nice, we enjoyed it every morning. 1 min. to the next store to buy some food and cheap falafel (compared average prices of Eilat) I can recommend this apartment to everybody.
I recommend the apartment and Jojo as a host!!!

Great location! Very close to city center and we could walk almost everywhere.  Nice view to the city as well. Studio was as on the photos, simple, but clean. We arrived at night and thanks to great instructions from Jojo, check-in was super easy. Jojo is very kind and helpful host. We would definitely recommend this plce for nice stay in Eilat!
Great location! Jojo is very fast replying and will give all information needed.
good enough
Fine room with Nice view over the Red Sea!

A nice apartment, very centrally located. It is well-equipped and has fast w-lan-internet (Eilat offers also city-free wlan in the city but this is quite slow.)
A small supermarket is just around the corner.
Eilat and the apartment are to be recommended.
Great host, great place - recommended!

Jojo's apartment is perfectly located, 7th floor with the best view on the Akaba bay, 5 min from the beach and marina, falafel place and grocery store just on the other side of the street. The flat is perfectly clean, the bed comfortable and Jojo is extremely helpful, not only the provided check in and out hints are great, but he also helped us with printing boarding passes on the very late notice. It was a real pleasure to stay in Jojo's place :)

Jojo's flat is a fantastic find on the seventh floor with beautiful views out across the beach. A five minute walk from the beach, Jojo's place is perfectly placed so that you can get a good night's sleep (even with the window open) and yet still be almost in the heart of all the action. The flat itself is great with a really comfortable bed, clean and well looked after. Jojo is a very friendly guy, and it was an absolute pleasure staying in his flat.
great placed. stay there if you visit Eilat. great location , and jojo was very promt and helpfull. thanks!

Wonderful apartment right in the heart of Eilat. The room has amazing views of the sea and surrounding mountains and is a five minute walk to the shopping and eating places. The beautiful coral reef is a ten minute car journey. Overall our stay at Jojo’s was perfect, jojo provided detailed information on checking in, the apartment was clean and jojo was always available to help with anything or offer advice on where to go. We will definitely be staying again.
Perfectly located appartment. Ideal to explore Eilat and its surroundings. Jojo was very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this place!

Jojo is an excellent, communicative host. He was very knowledgeable and informative about the Eilat area, which was greatly appreciated. The property is clean, as described in the listing, and in an excellent location close to central beaches and the seafront shops and restaurants. I would not hesitate to recommend both Jojo as a host, and his property.
Apartment was well located and clean. I would stay there again.

Do not plan to cook a lot, just simple breakfast or evening tea, but you will enjoy your stay, very good host, location perfect. ,clean
Take your soap/ other things for a shower
If I am going to Eilat still, I will stop in the same place! Everything was good! Especially view from the window and comfortable position of the apartment

Jojo is really helpful, quick to relieve any problem.
Also location is very good.

Everything was great !
The location, the services and the communication with Jojo.
I will definitely recommend his place to others !

Idan
Jojo is a very nice, accomodating host. The studio appartment was really well kept and neat.

Nice flat totally like the picture and well located. Jojo was very aware of all our needs.
Two things can be upgraded : if you are planning to cook, there is only one hob which can be a little frustrating.
The window doesn't close well so if you come in hot season expext to live with the air conditionner switched on even when you sleep or the flat become immediatly a furnace.
Thanks for hosting us jojo
Perfect location 15 minutes walk from the airport, 10 minutes walk to the nearest beach. Beautiful view from the window. I really recommend staying in Jojo's flat.

This studio was perfect for my girlfriend and I to have a beach/city break for a week or so. It was well equipped enough for making breakfast, clean and in a very good location. We walked most everywhere, except to the south near Egypt. There are lots of local restaurants and delivery options. Jojo is an awesome host - regularly checks in with advice and to see how you are. Check-in instructions are really easy to follow too
Great location!
Hello, our stay at Joe's place was really nice due to perfect location and good value for money. Joe is very nice and communicative host. We appreciate it. Thank you.
Jojo was a great host and his place is very central and convinient with great views.
the apartment was nice and clean, very close to everything. the host is very nice and helful.

There is nothing to complain about Jojo's accommodation. It's clean, equipped with everything you need and the most important is, it's very central. Just a 5 minute walk to the beach. During our stay, we were able to find a parking place at the house. We would stay at Jojo again and would recommend it.
Communication with Jojo was really good. He is a nice guy. The apt is as described and seen on the photos. We enjoyed our time in Eilat, thanks Jojo.
Great location, very close to the tourism center and the beach and the host was nice and helpful.
reviews.response: Thanks hope to see you guys again

reviews.comments: The appartment had everything you need. It was clean and easy to access. I can recommend this accommodation.
Nice place... perfect located
We had the best time in eilat! Jojo apartment was perfect for us
Great!

Nice studio with a wonderful view. Grate location, close to everything. Walking distance from bus station and airport.

Jojo was helpful and a nice guy. Would stay here again!
Great apartment, location and view. Good value for money and Jojo is a really nice, relaxed guy.

We spent a week in Jojo's apartment. It is studio apartment with a spectacular view through the window. It is almost on the top of the hill so you can see the best of the city. Everything was prepared, clean and we could definately come back here again!!!!
reviews.response: It was very nice to have you and thanks for the chocolates

reviews.comments: מיקום מעולה במרכז העיר
המיקום נהדר והדירה הייתה נקייה ומסודרת, המטבח היה קצת דל בכלים (מחבת אחת, סיר אחד, שתי כוסות) אז אם מתכננים בישול כדאי להביא כלים נוספים. מעבר לזה הצ׳ק אין עבר חלק והשהות הייתה נעימה
reviews.response: You are just being cheap and mean because I couldn't let you stay after check out (Website hidden by Airbnb) says in the description a kitchenette which means a small kitchen and everything is listed on airbnb so sorry there was  no real oven and only one pot and one pan...what did you expect

reviews.comments: יחידה נהדרת אסתטית מאוד מיקום טוב - קרוב לכול, יש חניה בשפע מתחת לבניין. קומה גבוהה צופה לים. ממש אחלה. נהנינו מאוד ובטוח שנחוזר!

מקום נקי ,מיקום קרוב יחסית לטיילת
יש סופר מתחת לבנין ויש חניה חופשית לבנין (לא כחול לבן ).המארח היה זמין עבורינו בוואטסאפ כשהיה צורך
הדירה נעימה, נקייה, עם חניה זמינה וחינמית, במיקום מרכזי שקרוב להכל במרחק הליכה. jojo זמין לשאלות. מומלץ בחום!
אחלה דירה , מיקום מצוין
מיקום מעולה , צ’אק אין עצמי ונוח , בעלי דירה זמין לכל דבר
אין באמת חניה פרטית כפי שמצוין. מעבר לזה די נחמד..

Месторасположение удобное, до моря 5-7 минут с моря 10-12 из за горы:) рядом минимаркет 24 часа, дешево и все есть. Из минусов по квартире это одна большая квартира разделена на 3 отдельные студии, т.е. вы снимаете одну из них. нам повезло соседей не было, а так наверное слышимость присутствовала бы.. расчетный час соблюдается строго, очень принципиальный хозяин положил ключи в 15-00, и в 11:03 уже уточнял звонил, освободили ли мы номер.
Excelente atención muy recomendable
Останавливаемся в студии второй раз, все ОК!

Véritable atout du logement est sa proximité du centre (-5min à pied) , il a aussi une vue exceptionnelle sur la ville. Un peu petit mais idéal pour 2 voyageurs, appartement propre et conforme aux attentes, JoJo est très réactif à vos demandes et fait tout pour y répondre, une adresse que je recommande ++ :)

O quarto é bastante pequeno. Mas, limpo e atendeu todas as minhas necessidades. Jojo é bastante atencioso e disponível para nos atender. A vista do quarto (que é uma janela) é linda. Amei. Voltaria e recomendaria este local. A localização é excelente
Apartamento muy bien ubicado y con excelente vista. Muy fácil acceso.

Аккуратная , тихая, ухоженная комната , очень близко от центра Эйлата, удобное местоположение , куча парковки под домом , заботливый и приятный хозяин и отличный




Quiet, clean and near in the tourist spot. Easy to go walk by. Property responsible person care was good. Quiet environment.
Quick response from host.

Muchísimas gracias por todo!!! muy lindo tu departamento y hermosa tu atención siempre atento a todo lo que necesitábamos, sos un genio!!! la verdad que no me equivoqué en nada al haber elegido tu alojamiento y desde ya te digo que en un par de años cuando vuelva a Israel voy a volver a pasar unos días en Eilat y voy a querer alojarme otra vez en tu departamento...muchas gracias por todo!!!
Y para todos los que están leyendo esto, realmente no duden en el elegir este departamento, esta ubicado en el mejor lugar de Eilat cerca de todo, tiene una vista hermosa ya que es un séptimo piso, hay supermercados cerca y todo tipo de negocios, bares, discos y restaurantes, uno de los Mall también esta a unas cuadras, un placer alojarse acà!!!
Хорошая студия, чисто, очень близко в пляжу, магазинам, кафе. Рекомендуем и сами обязательно приедем снова!
Perfekte Lage. Netter Host.
Jojo è sempre disponibile e gentile, risponde a tutte le tue esigenze. Casa molto centrale
Centralt och bra boende. Bra kontakt med värden. Boendet rekommenderas
Ein wirklich toller Ausblick! und ein kurzer Weg zum Strand. Perfekte Lage.

Das Haus und das "Apartment" sollten am Besten abgerissen werden. So eine Unterkunft ist nicht für saubere/ruhige Leute geeignet. Lärm, bellende Hunde nachts, Katzen um herum..das Studioapartment ist eine grosse Enttäuschung.
reviews.response: Lol 150 reviews say you are just sour and cheap.... If you dont want noise dont choose the city center. If you looking for luxury get hotel 150$ next time... The worst part is that on whatsupp you thanked me 5 times and said everything was fine

reviews.comments: Квартира расположена в самом центре Эйлата, в пяти минутах от пляжа и торгового центра. Прямо возле дома находится небольшой продуктовый магазин и небольшая точка, где можно купить вкусную Питу. В квартире есть всё необходимое для отдыха. Все детали хорошо продуманы. Есть полотенца, посуда, кондиционер, телевизор. Особенно хочется отметить потрясающий вид из окна на залив, который невозможно забыть. Хозяин готов помочь или дать совет, если необходимо. Стоит связаться с ним и получить конкретные рекомендации о возможностях отдохнуть, вкусно поесть или сделать выгодную покупку.
Qu’il est au 7 eme étage !
reviews.response: Oui avec ascenseur et cest aussi ecrit dans les descriptif sur airbnb, deplus avec la vue de la fenetre les gens déduisent que cest pas au premier

reviews.comments: Studio à 5mn de la plage et commerces. Excellent séjour. Hôte disponible et à l'écoute. Tout était parfait.
Вполне прилично

Комната соответствует описанию и фотографиям. Удобное расположение квартиры. 5 мин до пляжа и остановки автобусной , чтобы доехать до коралловых пляжей. Рядом маленькие магазинчики. Недалеко большой супермаркет. Хозяин приветливый. Комната маленькая, но на короткий срок вполне подходит. Соответствует своей цене.

name: Yaeli's Yam Soof
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Pets allowed - Assistance animals are always allowed
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: A great vacation apartment, clean, view of the red sea, ideal for couples and friends or families of up to 8 guests. walking distance from the beach, shopping center and town center. דירת נופש מקסימה ומרווחת מאווררת, מבית יעלי'ז. מאובזרת ונקייה, נוחה משפחתית ומודרנית עם נוף לים האדום. במיקום נוח קרוב למרכז העיר, למסעדות ולמקומות בילוי. דירה שתהפוך את החופשה שלכם לחלומית. מתאימה במיוחד למשפחות. קרובה למרכזי קניות, 12 דקות הליכה מהטיילת, מתאימה גם לקבוצת חברים עד 8 אנשים פשוט נעימה ונ ה ד ר ת
interaction: זמינים ב sms וWhatsApp שמחים לענות לכל שאלה

reviews.comments:
I hate hurting people’s livelihood but can’t lie on this: firstly they communicated well with us the whole time in spit of the problem.
Having said that when you have fleas in the bed nothing can compensate that.
They were ok with full refund etc. but that can’t be what one gets at a rented place no way!
Plus the location is in “the hood” if you get what I mean. Yes it’s cheap but you pay peanuts you get monkeys…or fleas (none you really wanna get).
reviews.response: We were amazed to hear from the guest that there was a problem with flees in the apartment.  Of course we took full responsibility and gave full refund including airbnb service fees. We did not receive any complaint from previous guests or guests who came after him regarding this issue but nevertheless we took action with a professional company to prevent any issues of this kind. We take pride in the appartments cleanliness as you can see from guests comments. Regarding "the hood" this is a normal Eilati neighborhood bulding with nice and normal neighbors. Regarding the price, Yeciel asked for a discount before arriving but we did not give it to him because our prices are fair with great value for money

reviews.comments: Fantastic place, very clean, and offered plenty of room for everyone. Everything needed was provided and we had an excellent time. Great price and I highly recommend!

We had a lovely vacation in Eilat. Three days and two nights. We know Eilat pretty well so when we picked the place we knew where it was in relationship to all the places we wanted to visit. There was parking right outside the apartment building. A few steps from the car to the entrance of the building. It's two flights up with no elevator, which was fine for us. Self check in was great. The apartment has three bedrooms each with its own TV and AC, and one bathroom with toilet sink and shower.. We were 5 people and there was plenty of space. Common area consisted of a couch and TV. Kitchen had a water filter, fridge, microwave, sandwich maker and toaster. There was even a washer and dryer off the kitchen.
Due to the Corona virus there were antibacterial wipes and alchogel.
The host was very responsive from the moment we booked the place till we checked out. I would recommend this place for a family that has a car to get to places around Eilat.
reviews.response:
תודה שכיבדתם את חוקי הבית
תודה על הביקורת המפורטת . נשמח לארח אותכם שוב

reviews.comments: Nice apartment, clean, comfortable. We only stayed there for one night, everything was as described.

As described. The apartment was on the second floor of a very quiet neighborhood. Driving distance from anywhere, but not really walking distance to anywhere, except a small grocery store. The place was mostly clean. I loved the extra towels. TV and AC in each room!  The hosts were very communicative. We'll definitely go back again.
We were only there for one night but it was great! Easy to check in, the place was spacious and clean, wish we could have stayed longer.
Good place. Great host
Great place

Spacious house at a good quite location, with free parking next to it, and close to nice and small park
Easy chick in even in late hours with the code lock

The apartment was exactly as advertised. Nothing is further than a 15 min drive and there is off street parking.
The ac works so well and there is an osmosis water purifier which we’re added benefits
Thank you!

Great place, good location. accurate descriptions. filtered cold water in kitchen. stayed with two children, was family friendly.
Do not go beyond check out time! We stayed in 1 hour past check out time due to circumstances beyond our control and were treated to so much rudeness. Besides that ugly side, they were great.
easy to communicate with, roomy apartment....all in all a seamless visit
Great location apartment, close to  everywhere, spacious, clean, well equipped, with lot of parking. Easy self check in.
Great apartment, clean with all you need and great value !

Anyone is planning a trip to Eilat with around 10 people, this place more than worth. The Cleanliness, the response from owner and it's not so far from the Tourist center.All the amenities are well placed without any issues.The area is Calm and Secured.
The place is clean and equipped with any amenities required for a pleasant stay. Very suitable for 2 couples, a Family with children, or even 2 divers as we are. Definitely recommend.

That’s the 2nd time we we use this apartment, the communication and hospitality is always on point and answers any question or issue. The apartment is clean and organized and has all relevant amenities for a stay. We love this apartment on our Eilat visits and highly recommends it
This is a great and neat place. The hosts make a great deal in helping you out. Highly recommend !

We enjoyed our stay at Yaeli’s very much. The apt. was clean, quite spacious and very comfortable (we were 6). The kitchen is very well equipped. Photos convey reality. The team helped us quickly when needed (nothing too serious,  just finding the closest supermarket, etc). Plenty of parking space. Entry to the apt. - very easy.  We’ll be very happy to return when in Eilat, again!
reviews.response:
תודה שבחרתם בסוף להגיע ועל האמון שנתתם בנו למרות המצבים הלא פשוטים שכולנו עוברים.
רק בערבות הדדית ודאגה משותפת נתגבר ונצליח
נשמח לארח אותכם שוב

reviews.comments: Nily from Yaelis was very responsive, thoughtful. She allowed us early entrance. The apartment was sparkling clean with all amenties needed, beds are very good, spacious apartement and very close to the main Eilat road so easily getting anywhere you want. very close to stores as well. no parking issues.
Very nice flat good location very friendly stuff.

The place is very clean and fully equiped. Even mask and pipe for snorkling are provided! The apartment can be easily found beacause of yellow flowerpots. There was also a place to park a car. There is a grocery store very close the Yael's place. Beds are very comfortable,  bedrooms equiped with TV, very quiet neighbourhood. The host replies quickly to questions and gives very detail information on any kind of situation. I am super happy that I could stay at Yeal's!
A great place to stay.....
Very nice apartment, great contact with the owner, cosmetics available, everything great

The app is ideal place to spend a few days in eilat. The host is very kind and helpfull.
I realy recomend.
A very nice place and even nicer host!
Everything was perfekt
Great place.  Everything was as it was shown or even better.
The apartment was comfortable and clean, we enjoy the stay. I hope we will stay at Yael again soon!

Very cozy flat that will make you feel at home. Yaeliz team was prompt to inform us, they had been in touch well before we arrived, providing all necessary information. The arrival was smooth, everything ready, clean and tidy. Superb value for reasonable price!
Perfect
Amazing place in Eilat. 10 min walk to sea and other main attractions. Place was clean and cosy to accomodate group of 7. We liked it

reviews.comments:
Large and beautiful apartment, very clean and very well equipped. There is a significant difference between the stylish and clean apartment and the neighborhood, but still the location is quite good and not far from the center and the beach.
Very good communication with the hosts over the phone.
It was very pleasant to stay in the apartment, we would love to come back again ... Thanks!

First thing to point out is that this apartment is lovely and much better than the impression given by the photos. There were lots of little touches that showed the host has really made the effort to make this a lovely holiday apartment.  The kitchen is well equipped with a huge fridge and water cooler and filter. The living area is spacious and bedrooms large. Air conditioning and WIFI worked well. Access was easy via key code. I was initially a little concerned at the location having viewed it on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps but the quality of the interior made up for the location. It is situated a good walk (45 mins to main Northern Beaches) but we had a hire car anyway and always travelled to Southern Beaches. Parking outside the apartment was no problem. Lovely place to stay overall and the host has done everything to make this a nice holiday apartment. We are a family of 2 adults and 2 older teenage sons and this place was ideal for us all.  Just have to add if you love snorkelling - go the Coral Beach Reserve it's great, we swam with a turtle amongst loads of other fantastic marine fish.

beautiful apartment with all comforts, air conditioning, wifi, terrace, very comfortable beds, cable TV and Netflix.  Excellent cleanliness and unbeatable location.  I highly recommend this accommodation!

זו הפעם השניה שלנו בדירה, לאחר שהתארחנו בה לפני שנה. שוב נהננו מאוד. מדובר בדירה שהיא VFM, תמורה מצויינת למחיר, מרווחת, מאובזרת ונקייה. הייתה לנו תקשורת מצויינת עם בעלי הבית. הדירה נמצאת קרוב לכניסה לאילת (מבחינתנו זה יתרון).
נחזור שוב ושוב.

הדירה נמצאת במקום שקט, בקומה שנייה, ללא מעלית. יש חניה ציבורית חינם ובשפע. מים חמים ע"י דוד שמש וחשמל, מטבח מאובזר כולל מקרר, מיקרוגל, טוסטר. מרפסת כביסה עם מכונת כביסה ומייבש. סלון ענק עם ספה זוגית נפתחת, 3 חדרי שינה עם מזגן וטלוויזיה בכל חדר. חדר רחצה 1 כולל מקלחון  ושירותים. בסמוך, במרחק הליכה, מרכז קניות. מתאים ל 7-8 אנשים בנוחות רבה או 4 זוגות (1 בסלון). אנחנו מאוד נהנינו.
דירה ענקית, נקייה, שמורה ואין צורך לשמור מפתח ולקחת איתך. ציון 10/10

דירה מקסימה בתוך מתחם בניינים באזור הצפוני של אילת.
הכל עבר חלק-החל מהתקשורת עם המארחים, הסבר ההגעה והכניסה לדירה.
הדירה הייתה מבריקה, מאובזרת, ממוזגת, שקטה לא היה חסר לנו כלום.
נהננו מאוד ונשמח לחזור להתארח בדירה זו שוב. תמורה גבוהה ביחס למחיר ששילמנו!

דירה פשוט מושלמת! היא מקסימה, נעימה ומרווחת! המיקום מעולה, התקשורת עם בעלת הדירה הייתה מאוד טובה ומהירה, היכולת לעשות צ'ק אין/אאוט באופן עצמאי ממש יעילה, יש חנייה ממש קרוב, טלוויזיה עם חיבור ל-HOT בכל חדר, מזגן בכל חדר, מטבח מאובזר - בקיצור, מושלם!

Отдыхали в конце февраля-начале марта семьёй из 6 человек. Немного были сомнения на счёт расположения апартаментов, спутниковые карты показывали страшненький район. На самом деле квартал очень приличный. Карты врут!)  Во-первых, расположение очень удачное. Пешком минут за 15 можно дойти до центра и развлечений и северного пляжа, с другой стороны близко выезд из города и крупные супермаркеты и торговые центры. Ну а до Южных прядей в любом случае надо добираться транспортом, либо автомобилем, либо автобусом.  Во-вторых, для машины всегда есть свободная парковка. Недалеко есть небольшие супермаркеты и много мест, где поесть. Ну а сама квартира выше всяких похвал. Браво хозяевам. Три комнаты, кухня, гостиная с прекрасным видом на Эйлат и Иорданию. Все чисто, уютно, прекрасно оборудовано, очень удобные кровати и чистейшее белье. Запас полотенец на все время! Встреча была организована дистанционно, но все очень понятно и продумано до мелочей. Кондиционеры в каждой комнате. Отдельное спасибо за маски для ныряния. И мы, и дети были в восторге!   Наверное, единственное пожелание это утюг и фен. Или мы их просто не нашли) Итог: очень рекомендую эти апартаменты и хозяев. Если вы хотите комфортно повести время в Эйлате - это прекрасное место, не сомневайтесь!

Nem találkoztunk személyesen, de nagyon egyszerű a self-check-in. A szállás tiszta, ízléses volt, nagy terekkel (3 db 2 személyes szoba), erkéllyel, felszerelt konyhával (mikrohullámú sütő, edények, kenyérpirító, sütő, minden), fürdővel (kaptunk tusfürdőt, sampont, hajbalzsamot, törölközőt). Hajszárító viszont nincs, de azt is intézett volna nekünk a kedves házigazda, ha időben szólunk! :) Van klíma amit mi fűtésre is használtunk, mert éjjel lehűlt a lakás. A környék ijesztőnek tűnhet, de a szálláshelyre belépve ez az érzés megszűnik. Szívből ajánlom mindenkinek!

Wir waren Anfang Dezember mit 5 Personen in Eilat und durften Yaels Appartement genießen. Es ist sehr geräumig, gut ausgestattet und wir haben es sehr sauber angetroffen. Betten und Bettbezüge ware angenehm. Alles was wir brauchten war vorhanden. Die Kommunikation lief über (Hidden by Airbnb) ...und das sehr schnell, nett und entspannt. Man kann sich hier einfach wohl fühlen. Das Stadtzentrum ist mit dem Auto sehr schnell zu erreichen...bis zu den Südstränden braucht man 5-10 Minuten. Alles in allem ein sehr gutes Appartement eine wunderbare Gastfreundschaft seitens Yael. Wir empfehlen dieses Appartement und hoffen selber mal wieder
Отличный вариант для большой компании из 5-6 человек. Чисто, уютно, все работает.
דירה מהממת עם נוף לעיר
תודה רבה

Мы отдыхали в апартаментах пятеро. Остались очень довольны. Хозяйка отвечает чётко и быстро. Квартира просторная, на самом деле лучше выглядит, чем на фото. Кровати удобные,  есть все необходимое. Стоянка рядом с домом. Мы остались довольны.
אירוח מושלם. יחס אישי. דירה  מבריקה ומאובזרת. הרגשה שאתה בבית

הגענו לדירה של נילי 6 אנשים.נכנסנו לדירה שעתים לפני הזמן המקובל ככה שזה היה מאוד נחמד .כשהגענו למקום ,פגשה אותנו אם הבית והסבירה על הכל ,עשתה סיור,בכל חדר יש מזגן,מצעים נקיים,מגבות,טלויזיה,יש מטבח מאובזר עם קפה וכלי מטבח,  בשירותים ומקלחת היה שמפו מרכך נייר טואלט,לא היה חסר שום דבר.כשאתם מגיעים לדירה אפשר פשוט להיכנס ולגור בה ,יש שם הכל.מיקום של הדירה לבעלי רכב מאוד נוח..7 דק נסיעה ואתם בטיילת, ליד השכונה יש איזור תעשייה ואפשר למצוא שם חנויות כמו יינות ביתן,רמי לוי,שופרסל,מקס סטוק וכו..חשוב לציין שיש  חניה מתחת לבית.בגלל שיצאנו בשבת נאמר לנו שאנכנו יכולים לצאת בלי לחץ בשעה שנוחה לנו.מאוד נהננו מהחופשה.תודה רבה
reviews.response: תודה שבאתם אילנו נשמח לראות אותכם שוב

reviews.comments: Gabriela & Gil are great hosts who communicated well and were helpful in every way, making sure we had what we needed and providing us with an abundance of local information.  Their place is rich with amenities considering its humble size; it truly has everything you need to cook, eat, sleep, work, watch entertainment.  Though so much is in one tiny room, the space is not overwhelming.  One peculiar feature is, after entering through a cozy breezeway, you then walk into the building through the bathroom.  This didn't pose any problem for us, but is certainly a strange energetic.  I think their airbnb listing is completely honest and if you are looking for something more affordable in Eilat, this place is an excellent option!
very nice cozy place...warm hospitality....great service....the host was great and quick to respond...i would stay here again in the future!!!

Gabriela's place served us perfectly, we really enjoyed our stay, the place is clean, comfortable, amenities were right on spot including Tami4 and Netflix. Must have a car to get to the center of Eilat, about 5 min drive. Oh, and the owners are very responsive. Gabriela and Gil, Thank you for a great stay!

Very sociable and friendly host. We arrived at night by car and without problems parked near the house at free parking, easily got into the apartment with keybox.
Quick resolve all issues, thank you for tasty pie.

Gil was a perfect host, he gave us many useful tips about the location, recommended a great restaurant, he even gave us a lift to the centre and overall did more for us than a „normal“ host would do. The apartment itself was very clean, the beds very comfortable and there was even a washing machine which we appreciated. Space-wise, I would say it's ideal for a couple, for a four-member family (with one infant) it was a bit tight but okay for a short stay. The neighbourhood is very peaceful and far from the busy and touristy part of the town, not so far from the sea though. Recommended!
Great place, the host was really helpful and nice. Great local recommendations 👍
The place is nice and the host is always ready to help.
The host very caring and helpful in everything we wanted to know. Very thanks for kindness ang hosting. We can recommend this place for everybody who want to see Israel.

We can wholeheartedly recommend staying here. Outstanding hospitality and attention to detail. Our hosts Gabriela and Gil went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and at home, from picking us up at the bus station to arranging Acces to several of the best hotel pools in Eilat. They even made sure we had something to eat the first evening upon arriving after a five hour bus trip. It doesn’t get much better than this when it comes to hospitality.

reviews.comments: This is a very nice apartment in a quiet area of Eilat. It is not very close to the center or the beach, but there is a bus stop close by and if you have a car you can easily get to the center. Gabriela and Gil were very nice to us and helped with everything while also offering a clean and comfortable airbnb. You get a lot of pillows, a comfortable bed, plenty of towels and a good kitchen to cook in. There is also a TV with Netflix to entertain yourself. It is great value for money!
reviews.response: thank you it was pleasure  to have you

I wish I will be back. In polish: POLECAM !!

reviews.comments: הדירה ממוקמת הרחק מהמרכז באופן שמאפשר להגיע אליה בנוחות רבה, גם כאשר העיר עמוסה בתיירים. מאובזרת באופן יוצא מהכלל גם לשהות ארוכה. האזור שקט, בדירה שומעים לעתים את קולות השכנים. המארח קשוב ונענה מיידית ובנדיבות.
אחלה מקום להתארח באילת. תקשורת טובה מול המארחים, נקי מסודר ונוח. יש מטבחון לבשל וחנייה באזור +סופר קטן שפתוח גם בסופש. היינו ארבעה לילות והיה מוצלח!
הנאה צרופה.

Gabriela отличный хозяин. В студии есть все необходимое для проживания и отдыха на море, хорошая посуда, удобства, идеальная чистота! Еще до приезда мы получили инструкции и советы, какие места посмотреть в Эйлате, хозяин всегда был на связи. Отдельное спасибо за теплое отношение - очень здорово открыть утром дверь и получить от хозяина сюрприз в виде кекса и свежайших лепешек. Спасибо, это был отличный отдых!
reviews.response: Thank you so much

reviews.comments: Il monolocale di Gabriela è indicato per 2 persone,anche in 3 ci si può adattare,è un'ottima soluzione economica come base per visitare Eilat e dintorni.Posizionato non propriamente in zona centrale,ma con buon servizio bus e taxi.Zona nuova di Eilat.Il monolocale è composto da una camera con angolo cottura e per accedere a questo bisogna passare prima da un piccolo atrio e poi dal bagno.All'interno c'è tutto l'occorrente:Tv con Netflix,coperte,asciugamani,forno a microonde,frigo,lavatrice,ferro da stiro,eccetera.Il punto forte di tutto il soggiorno è stato il preziosissimo aiuto che ci ha dato il marito di Gabriela:sempre disponibile e con risposte super veloci,ci ha aiutato veramente tantissimo e in più di un occasione ci ha offerto dei passaggi con la sua auto e ci ha dato la possibilità di avere qualche sconto su alcune attrazioni.Grazie ancora!
reviews.response:
thank you so much.
hope to see you again.
all the best for you and famely.
gil and gabriela
